article.headline: George Washington 80, St. Bonaventure 71
article.story: OLEAN, N.Y. (AP) -- Damian Hollis and Maureece Rice each scored 17 points to lead George Washington over St. Bonaventure 80-71 in Atlantic 10 Conference play Saturday. Noel Wilmore added 16 points for George Washington (7-14, 3-8). Rob Diggs finished with 12 points. Tyler Relph scored 21 points and grabbed eight rebounds for the Bonnies (7-17, 1-9). Michael Lee added 20 points and Zarryon Fereti had 11. The Colonials went on a 14-0 run to take a 36-22 lead with 4:16 remaining in the first half. George Washington held its biggest lead of 70-51 with 5:14 remaining in the game. The Bonnies responded with a 20-6 run to cut their deficit to seven. But the Colonials made four free throws in the final 27 seconds to seal the victory.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
